name: @saekitominaga/customelements-portal
description: Add animated motion to the `<portal>` element by Custom Elements.
author: Saeki Tominaga

scripts._build:compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/Portal.js -- brotlin compress dist/Portal.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/Portal.js -- terser dist/Portal.js -o dist/Portal.min.js -c ecma=2020 --mangle --ecma 2020 --module --source-map content='dist/Portal.js.map',filename='Portal.js',includeSources,url='Portal.min.js.map'
scripts._build:minify-compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/Portal.min.js -- brotlin compress dist/Portal.min.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify-declaration: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/Portal.d.ts -- cpy dist/Portal.d.ts dist --rename=Portal.min.d.ts
